title: Card 1
text: The lion is a powerful big cat known as the “king of the jungle.”

title: Card 2
text: Tigers are solitary, striped predators found mainly in forests of Asia.

title: Card 3
text: Elephants are the largest land animals, known for their intelligence and trunks.

title: Card 4
text: Dogs are loyal and friendly animals, often called man’s best friend.

title: Card 5
text: Pandas are gentle bears that mostly eat bamboo and live in China.

title: Card 6
text: Cows are domesticated herbivores that provide milk and meat.
